text: How he entered the house of God (making Abiathar high priest)My rendering is rather different than the ‘in the days of Abiathar the high priest’ of the AV. We are translating three Greek words that very literally would be ‘upon Abiathar high priest’. As a direct result of David's visit, Abiathar became high priest. For a complete discussion please see the Appendix: Abiathar is not Ahimelech. and ate the consecrated bread, which only priests are permitted to eat, and shared it with those who were with him?”
